0255c50ecb6becab9477e445c3cb8237.question: Steps to borrow a book?
0255c50ecb6becab9477e445c3cb8237.answer:
**Step-by-Step Procedure:**

• 110. 
 
Journal  article  with two author s 
Format:  
Author,  A. A., & Author,  B. B. (Year).  Title of article.  Journal  Title, Volume(Issue),  pages.  
Example:  
Achieng,  Lucy A., & Otieno,  Mark O. (2020).  Use of electronic  resources  by university 
students  in Kenya.  African  Journal  of Library,  Archives  and Information  Science , 30(2),  85–
• 97. 
 
Journal  Article  with Three  Authors  
Format:  
Author,  A. A., Author,  B. B., & Author,  C. C. (Year).  Title of article.  Journal  Title, 
Volume(Issue), pages.  
Example:  
Mwangi,  Peter  N., Wanjiru,  Anne K., & Kamau,  David  M. (2022).  Adoption  of digital  library 
services  in public  universities.  Library  Management , 43(6–7), 410–423.

• JSTOR:  Archival academic journals (humanities, social sciences)  
• SpringerLink:  Science, engineering, medicine journals  
• IEEE Xplore:  Engineering, computing, technology journals  
• Taylor & Francis Online:  Multidisciplinary journals  
MAJOR E -BOOK DATABASES:  
• EBSCO eBooks:  Comprehensive academic e -books  
• ProQuest Ebook Central:  120,000+ e -books in all subjects  
• Springer eBooks:  Science and technical e -books  
• Elsevier eBook Collections:  Medical and scientific e -books  
• Cambridge Core:  Academic books and journals  
ONLINE DATABASES INCLUDE:  
• Journal articles, e -books, research reports  
• Theses & dissertations, newspapers  
• Statistical data, multimedia content  
 
SECTION 9: OPEN ACCESS DATABASES (FREE ACCESS)  
WHAT IS OPEN ACCESS?  
Free, unrestricted access to research articles, books, and data without login or payment.  
TOP 15 OPEN ACCESS DATABASES:
• 1. DOAJ (Directory of Open Access Journals)  
o Subject: Multidisciplinary  
o Link: https://doaj.org
• 2. CORE  
o Subject: Multidisciplinary  
o Link: https://core.ac.uk
• 3. BASE (Bielefeld Academic Search Engine)  
o Subject: Multidisciplinary  
o Link: https://www.base -search.net
• 4. arXiv  
o Subject: Physics, Math, Computer Science  
o Link: https://arxiv.org
